  • Uses of PiecewiseConstant in net.sourceforge.plantuml.project.ngm.math

    Classes in net.sourceforge.plantuml.project.ngm.math that implement PiecewiseConstant
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AbstractPiecewiseConstant
    Base class for PiecewiseConstant implementations whose value is constant over contiguous time segments.
    class 
    Combiner
    Utilities to combine multiple PiecewiseConstant functions.
    final class 
    PiecewiseConstantHours
     
    final class 
    PiecewiseConstantSpecificDays
    Immutable implementation of PiecewiseConstant that models a workload pattern defined by specific dates.
    final class 
    PiecewiseConstantTimeWindow
    Immutable implementation of PiecewiseConstant that models a time window where work is enabled (value = 1) only within a specific period, and disabled (value = 0) before and after that period.
    final class 
    PiecewiseConstantWeekday
    Immutable implementation of PiecewiseConstant that models a weekly workload pattern.
